contents.text: Welcome to Spark Program, a San Francisco nonprofit uniting diverse communities to empower middle school students to discover their potential.
For information about our student programs, press 1.
For program schedules and locations, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our program coordinator.

navigationGoals: Get the current dates and locations for the middle school programs.
Get schedule and location details for Spark Program’s middle school sessions so I can enroll my child.
I need the schedule matrix and location coordinates for your middle school STEM modules.
Could you please tell me where and when the Spark Program classes are held?
I’d like details on when and where the Spark Program physics workshops take place.

contents.text: For enrollment requirements and eligibility questions, press 2.
Thank you for your patience—an enrollment specialist will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Confirm enrollment requirements and how to apply for the student programs.
Find out what my child needs to qualify for the student program and what paperwork to prepare.
I want to check the enrollment eligibility parameters and required documentation for the robotics track.
I need help understanding the enrollment requirements to see if my grandchild qualifies.
I want to find out what the application requirements are and if I’m eligible to join.

contents.text: For community partnerships and support options, press 2.
For volunteer and mentorship opportunities, press 1.
One moment please—connecting you to our volunteer coordinator.

navigationGoals: Learn how to sign up as a volunteer mentor and what the commitment looks like.
Learn how I can sign up as a volunteer mentor for Spark Program’s students.
I'd like to join as a mentor and review the onboarding workflow and mentor-mentee matching algorithm.
I’m interested in volunteering as a mentor and would like to know how to sign up.
I’m interested in volunteering as a physics mentor for middle school students.

contents.text: For donations and fundraising events, press 2.
Thank you for your support—a fundraising specialist will assist you shortly.

navigationGoals: Make a donation and find out about upcoming fundraising events.
Ask about how to make a donation or host a fundraising event to support Spark Program.
I'm looking to automate my monthly donation via ACH and get details on the next fundraising hackathon.
I’d like information on how to make a donation and details about upcoming fundraising events.
I’d like information on how to get involved in upcoming fundraising efforts for the program.
